name: Sensei's Dojo
description:
Can't hit what you can't see? Prove them wrong.

Every year people search for OP-sensei, a misterious martial arts expert who lives secluded 
in his dojo, rarely seeing anyone else. One of those students is you, picked by the master
himself to be trained on the ways of the shuriken. But reward doesn't come without risk.
You must stop the ninja stars OP-sensei throws at you trusting your ears and your own
confidence in that which you perceive. Good luck, youngling. Sensei can be special sometimes.

This Game was made for the #DiscordJAM

Art, Programming - Joan "Relos" Soler Pla

Art, Music, Voiceover - Jaime "Imjeax" Almenar Fernández
